name: V.H.I.T
description:
Note: Due to a bug (that has already been fixed), you may not get points while playing, this means you will only see the first type of enemy.  If this happens to you, please try to download the Windows version or just reload the page. If that doesn't fix the issue but you want to see what the other enemies are like, check this video.After the Jam voting period is over, I will update the game with the fix!

In V.H.I.T (read "vit"), you play as a hacker who has gained access to a top-secret tool, the "Visual Hacking Interface Tool". Use VHIT to obtain as much data as possible before you are stopped!

Loading data has its downsides though, while the download is -Pending- you will be bombarded with malicious, corrupt data sent as a countermeasure by those you are hacking.

This game was made for the Nordic Game Jam, where the theme was "Pending".

If you'd like to see some of my other projects, please visit here

Credits:

Design, art, and programming: Elias Diez (me)

Music & SFX: All were acquired through either freesound or some other publicly available source. 

Main track, Cyber Race

CRT Camera effect
